attributes.action: Ensure the 2012 Olympic gold medals are ethically sourced
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gold can, and often is, extracted in was which exploit local communities and damage the local environment. Gold mining could benefit the developing countries that have the gold far more than it does. Using ethically sourced Gold for the 2012 medals is a positive recognition of the steps the mining industry can take, and is taking, to improve the gold trade.
